name: Kawanoikioi
body:
#About the Project
Kawanoikioi is a CMS (Content Management System) programmed using ASP.NET with C#. Current features are: Media (Currently containing Images and Articles), a Forum system and more.

#Planned Features are
* System for Video uploading and viewin#g.
* Chat
* User Blogs
